Description:
Superbly Presented Townhouse with Own Street Frontage Access
IMPORTANT NOTICE: SUBMISSION OF OFFER IS NOW CLOSED .
This exciting stand-alone property on approx. 311m2 of titled land combines low maintenance, townhouse living with fresh family appeal. Perfect for first home buyers, families and investors, this modern residence is sure to be a market favourite.
Street frontage and a private driveway offer instant kerbside appeal whilst light filled spaces, fresh paint and new carpets create inviting interiors throughout the home. The downstairs layout comprises an open plan kitchen and dining area, separate living room, laundry, guest powder room, study/home office and third bedroom. The sleek kitchen glistens with perennially appealing white cabinetry, luxurious stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances and plenty of cupboard storage space. The casual breakfast bar is perfect for busy morning meals whilst the adjoining dining area is ideal for both relaxed family meals and large formal dinner parties.
Head upstairs to find a study nook with built in desk, two large sized bedrooms with robes and two fully tiled bathrooms accented by trendy black fittings. Bonus extras of the home include timber style flooring, modern downlights, ducted heating, ceiling fans and two reverse cycle air conditioners as well as an alarm system and security shutters for that extra peace of mind.
The secure rear courtyard offers a largely paved, almost no maintenance, outdoor space which is paired with a double garage for secure, off-street parking plus a wide driveway for additional family vehicles or convenient guest parking
From your new home you can stroll to Keeley Park or First Street Reserve for fresh air family fun, take your energetic pets to the nearby off lead park, walk to the vibrant Clayton Road shopping precinct or utilize Clayton Train Station and Haughton Road bus service for stress free travel options. Also just minutes to St Peter's Primary School, Westall Secondary College, Monash Hospital, Monash University and the Princes Highway, it is the ideal location to set up and stay!
